description: Retrieves metadata information about one of your applications. The application can be specified by its ARN, ID, or name (which is unique within one account in one region at a given point in time). Specify by ARN or ID in automated workflows if you want to make sure that the exact same application is returned or a ResourceNotFoundException is thrown, avoiding the ABA addressing problem.

parameters.name: application
parameters.description: The name, ID, or ARN of the application.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the application.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) that specifies the application across services.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the application. The name must be unique in the region in which you are creating the application.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the application.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The ISO-8601 formatted timestamp of the moment when the application was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdateTime
nested_items.description: The ISO-8601 formatted timestamp of the moment when the application was last updated.

nested_items.name: associatedResourceCount
nested_items.description: The number of top-level resources that were registered as part of this application.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: integrations
nested_items.description: The information about the integration of the application with other services, such as Resource Groups.

nested_items.name: resourceGroup
nested_items.description: The information about the resource group integration.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the propagation process for the resource group. The states includes:

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the resource group.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message that generates when the propagation process for the resource group fails.

nested_items.name: applicationTagResourceGroup
nested_items.description: The information about the resource group integration.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the propagation process for the resource group. The states includes:

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the resource group.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message that generates when the propagation process for the resource group fails.

nested_items.name: applicationTag
nested_items.description: A key-value pair that identifies an associated resource.
